summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganSustainable PackagingGive BackTransform your skin overnight with Dermalogica's Sound Sleep Cocoon Night Gel-Cream. This nourishing and revitalizing treatment brightens and protects skin with antioxidant Vitamin C, and promotes deep restful sleep with soothing French lavender and sandalwood.
details: DetailsBenefitsTransforms skin overnight by optimizing the skin's recovery processPromotes deep, restful sleep for healthier-looking skinVisibly increases radiance by morningReduces skin fatigue and restores vitalityBest for those experiencing dry skin, fine lines, wrinkles, dullness and uneven textureKey IngredientsTamarind Seed: naturally occurring, moisturizes and reduces moisture loss and protects skin's barrier functionPersian Silk Tree: provides overnight antioxidant protection and fights free radicals while brightening, reducing signs of fatigueWu-Zhu-Yu Fruit Extract: powerful anti-inflammatory that helps boost microcirculation in skin, enhancing skin radiance and luminosityFormulated WithoutParabensSulfatesPhthalatesSynthetic FragranceItem 2522809How To UseSmooth over face and neck as the last step in your nighttime regimen. Allow gel-cream to melt into skin overnight.IngredientsWater/Aqua/Eau, Dimethicone, Glycerin, Propanediol, Polymethylsilsesquioxane, Albizia, Julibrissin Bark Extract, Dimethicone/PEG-10/15 Crosspolymer, Sodium Chloride, Evodia Rutaecarpa Fruit Extract, Lavandula Hybrida Abrial Herb Oil, Tocopheryl Acetate, Terminalia Ferdinandiana Fruit Extract, Caprylhydroxamic Acid, Trisodium Ethylenediamine Disuccinate, Tamarindus Indica Seed Polysaccharide, Dipropylene Glycol, Lavandula Angustifolia (Lavender) Flower Extract, Ethylhexylglycerin, Fusanus Spicatus Wood Oil, Pogostemon Cablin Leaf Oil, Sodium Citrate, PEG-10 Dimethicone, Hexanediol, Polyurethane Crosspolymer-1, Limonene, Tocopherol, Citric Acid, Linalool, Phenoxyethanol.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: Smooth over face and neck as the last step in your nighttime regimen. Allow gel-cream to melt into skin overnight.

reviews.headline: Smells lovely but does nothing.
reviews.comments: I am a big Dermalogica fan and had high hopes for this product. When I received it i realized I bought it once before and was disapponted then too. It smells nice but does not seem to deliver any of the promoaed results. For the price I would invest in another Dermalogica product.

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: I really like Dermalogica products. This particular moisturizer feels so nice on my face at night before I go to bed. Anything I can do to improve my skin at 69 is a bonus for me.

reviews.headline: Product is GREAT! Package is awful.
reviews.comments: I love this stuff. I would die for this product. But the packaging is terrible. I get it, they're trying to be innovative and interesting. But it just doesn't work well. A bag of moisturizer crammed into a jar leaves a lot of room for air and even more room for product waste. When air gets into it and it won't pump out product, the only way to force out the air is to open the jar to squeeze the bag. Once you open that jar it is never the same. Dear Dermalogica, just put the product in a tube or screw top jar. We don't need the pump/jar combo.

reviews.headline: Room for Improvement
reviews.comments: The scent is great and it does moisturize but even the smallest amount leaves you waking up with your face feeling Caked and Clammy. It feels like when you put sunscreen on and it doesn't absorb all the way. It feels gross and to also mention that while it brightened skin slightly  it didn't reduce my dark circles or eye bags at all.

reviews.headline: Not worth it
reviews.comments: I was looking to replace an amazing night gel cream from Bare Minerals (skin longevity).  This product is NOT HYDRATING. In one week i look like i have aged because my skin is crabing moisture. Im slready looking for another night cream. This product smells horrible. Who wants patchouli in 2025 ?! The smell is reminiscent of a dirty hippy making a poor attempt to mask the stench.

reviews.headline: Great for Faces
reviews.comments: This product is great for bedtime for my face.

reviews.headline: I will buy it again
reviews.comments: Love the way t makes my skin feel

reviews.headline: Love it
reviews.comments: Been using this product every night for the past 3yrs.

reviews.headline: Packaging is confusing
reviews.comments: Im not sure why this comes in this sort of container but for this proce id like to be able to get all kf thenproduxt put and you simply cannot with this. Also, i ise all Dermalogica produxts and im not sire why there is fragrance in this one. It's unnecessary and off putting. I didn't feel like this did anything special. I will ne sticking with the skin smoothing moisturizer going forward. Thought I'd try one of their moisturizers specifically for PM, but i just dont like this one overall.

reviews.headline: LOVE
reviews.comments: Everything about this night cream is AMAZING. So glad I have added this to my skin care routine.

reviews.headline: Meh
reviews.comments: I don't like the smell, at all. The consistency is good but that's about it. It's too expensive for what it is and I will not be repurchasing when I run out.

reviews.headline: Terrific night cream!
reviews.comments: The woman who gives me a facial used this product on me to help with hydration of my skin.  She gave me a sample to try at home, and I went out and purchased this within 3 days.  It is a real winner in the Dermalogica line of products.  I love it!!

reviews.headline: Leaves face super soft
reviews.comments: It leaves my face feeling amazing, except its so expensive for such little product. Rather disappointing.

reviews.headline: Stinks
reviews.comments: The Patchouli scent is so strong. Even if I woke up with the most perfect skin I wouldn't use it again specifically because of the awful smell.

reviews.headline: The scent is overpowering.
reviews.comments: I love Dermologica products and this is a new one I tried last night. Unfortunately, it made me feel queasy. I'm sensitive too strong scents and this is no exception. It's incredibly strong and not pleasant imo.

reviews.headline: Worth a splurge
reviews.comments: This cream is lightweight, smells terrific and is a great way to pamper myself as part of my night routine. It goes on light- you barely feel it's there but you can feel the moisture, and it leaves no tacky residue. The next morning it is all absorbed and you don't feel like you need to wash it off in the morning. The scent is so relaxing and unique and the feel is silky. My skin looks plump and refreshed in the morning, is soft, and my skin tone is even and bright, & healthy looking. The dispenser is the best thing. It locks so the product stays fresh; there is a pump so you don't need to put your fingers in it which I LOVE, but you still have the elegance of a jar. Worth the splurge.

reviews.headline: Wanted to love this!
reviews.comments: I wanted to live this product! I've heard great things about Dermalogica and I love their sunscreen (which I HIGHLY recommend). This lotion smells AH-MAZING!!!! Loved the smell for night time toutine. However, it is not at all moisturizing. I used medicated Retinol from my Dermatologist every night and paired with this moisturizer I felt my skin was "thirsty/dry" in the morning vs soft and supple. I tried the lotion without using my Retinol for 2 weeks and I saw a minor improvement. My skin was still very dry the next morning. I recommend the Sunday Riley Ice moisturizer over this! It's cheaper and pairs FABULOUSLY with a medical Retinol.

reviews.headline: good!
reviews.comments: I got this product a while back and I used it on my younger skin and it worked well, but on my more aged skin it doesn't exactly hydrate the way I want it to? but I love looking like I was just dunked in water so ... if you want slight hydration I would absolutely recommend.

reviews.headline: In love
reviews.comments: I got a small container as a free gift and im so in love with it. It feels amazing as soon as I put on my skin. It absorbs right away and its super smooth and refreshing. Saving up to buy more  because I love it so much

reviews.headline: Excellent Night Cream
reviews.comments: I love this stuff. I'm a long time Dermalogica user and found this cream through a small sample I received. I used it once and was obsessed!  It melts into your skin, smells great and give such a soft smooth finish. Can't get enough!

faceoff_positive.comments: I got a sample of this product because I work at a salon and I am always up for try new products. So, when I first opened my little pack I put very little on my finger tip  and rubbed it around my face. At first I wasn't a fan of the smell but after a few seconds I felt calm and ready to go to sleep. Sounds crazy but it was soothing. The next morning my skin looked great and ready for the day. It's an amazing product.
faceoff_positive.headline: Can't wait for this product!

faceoff_negative.comments: Cream is great, design of jar not.  It's a pump on jar which came damaged. Didn't work and had to be returned.   Why can't you just put in a jar with a little spatula?   There will be waste this way as well.   Not worth the money.
faceoff_negative.headline: Horrible design on usage
